name: uNoGS
description: uNoGS (unofficial Netflix online Global Search) allows anyone to search the global Netflix catalog.  uNoGS (unofficial Netflix online Global Search) allows anyone to easily search the global Netflix catalog. V2 is now out and designed from the ground up to work with RapidAPI.
